accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA standards. Use dark charcoal (#2D2A26) for body text on light backgrounds.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings using the primary color (#4A3B32) with 2px offset.
accessibility.motion: Respect prefers-reduced-motion. Use simple fades and slides, avoid rapid flashing.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Pastoral' theme by using the specified color palette and typography.
Use the 'Merriweather' font for all headings to give a warm, literary feel.
Use 'Manrope' for body text for modern readability.
Ensure the 4 Archetype colors (Crimson, Amber, Jade, Azure) are used consistently for their respective sections.
The default language is Indonesian. Ensure UI accommodates longer text strings.
Use the provided image URLs for the Series selection cards.
Apply the 'texture' visual enhancer (cream paper pattern) to the main background to avoid a sterile digital look.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Avoid pure black (#000000) and pure white (#FFFFFF) for large surfaces; use the off-white and charcoal tones defined.
Use generous padding (p-8, p-12) to create a relaxed, unhurried atmosphere.
Buttons should be pill-shaped (rounded-full) to feel friendly and organic.
